A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This will grow on the haters with time\, just like Empire did.  The trilogy is not finished and I think that\, ultimately\, this will take Star Wars in a new direction\, which is not a bad thing.  Disney can't just make the original trilogy over and over again.  For great movie making to happen\, they have to take us somewhere new and surprising\, just like the originals did.
